doc.title: Demanded
doc.plot: Demanded is an On-Demand original program from Music Choice, co-hosted by a different chart-topping music artist every episode. There are three segments: In D'p, where the fans get the latest scoop on the featured artist's life and career; The Diversion, a separate segment highlighting a different top artist; and Digits, where the top 5 most demanded videos on Music Choice are reviewed.
